title: GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum - Frequently Asked Questions

faqs.question: What is GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum?
faqs.answer: GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum is formulated with 10% Vitamin C Vitamin C to deliver visible results.

faqs.question: Is this product safe for sensitive skin?
faqs.answer: Severity: Low. Always perform a patch test before use.

faqs.question: Can I use this product during pregnancy?
faqs.answer: Perform a patch test before use and discontinue if irritation occurs.
